post:
Greetings !

I am here to offer you humble cPanel web hosting at 6 different locations from $2/year

Use Coupon Code **CHRISTMASLET** for a recurring 60 % all plans. Please note prices stated after this, are prices after discount is applied. Order links are suppose to include the coupon already, but if its missing, please enter it !

**Feature List :**

1 ) Daily Backups ( JetBackups/R1Soft ) - Available at all locations except UK

2 ) LiteSpeed Web Server - Available at all locations except UK

3 ) CloudLinux OS - Available at all locations except UK

4 ) CloudLinux Limits :

Las Vegas ( BuyShared ) - 1 CPU 1 GB RAM, 20 EP, 100 Processes, 25 MB Disk I/O

Luxembourg ( BuyShared ) - 1 CPU 1 GB RAM, 20 EP, 100 Processes, 25 MB Disk I/O

Asia ( Hostmantis @ OVH ) 1 CPU 3 GB RAM, 30 EP, 100 Processes, 2 MB Disk I/O

UK ( MSPnick @ his basement ) - No cloudlinux, that pleb

Atlanta & Netherlands ( Ramnode ) - 1 CPU 1 GB RAM, 20 EP, 100 Processes, 40 MB Disk I/O

**Standard Plan**
1 GB Disk Space - 100 GB Bandwidth ( 10 GB in Asia ) - Host ONE domain only ( one main domain, no addon domains, but unlimited subdomains )

Only $2.00/year 
Order @ [Las Vegas ( USA )](https://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/usa_hosting/?group_id=1&pricing_id=1&coupon=CHRISTMASLET) | [Atlanta ( USA )](https://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/atlanta_hosting/?group_id=7&pricing_id=185&coupon=CHRISTMASLET) | [UK](http://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/uk_hosting/?group_id=3&pricing_id=9&coupon=CHRISTMASLET) | [OffShore ](http://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/offshore_hosting/?group_id=2&pricing_id=5&coupon=CHRISTMASLET)| [Asia](http://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/asia_hosting/?group_id=5&pricing_id=149&coupon=CHRISTMASLET) | [Netherlands](http://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/netherlands_hosting/?group_id=6&pricing_id=197&coupon=CHRISTMASLET)

**Medium Plan**
3 GB Disk Space - 300 GB Bandwidth ( 30 GB in Asia ) - Host THREEs domain only ( one main domain, 3 addon and 3 Parked domains domains, but unlimited subdomains )

Only $4.00/year 
Order @ [Las Vegas ( USA )](https://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/usa_hosting/?group_id=1&pricing_id=2&coupon=CHRISTMASLET) | [Atlanta ( USA )](https://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/atlanta_hosting/?group_id=7&pricing_id=188&coupon=CHRISTMASLET) | [UK](http://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/uk_hosting/?group_id=3&pricing_id=10&coupon=CHRISTMASLET) | [OffShore ](http://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/offshore_hosting/?group_id=2&pricing_id=6&coupon=CHRISTMASLET)| [Asia](http://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/asia_hosting/?group_id=5&pricing_id=152&coupon=CHRISTMASLET) | [Netherlands](http://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/netherlands_hosting/?group_id=6&pricing_id=200&coupon=CHRISTMASLET)

**Premium Plan**
5 GB Disk Space 500 GB Bandwidth ( 50 GB in Asia ) Host unlimited domains ( unlimited domains, and unlimited subdomains )

Only $8.00/year 
Order @ [Las Vegas ( USA )](https://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/usa_hosting/?group_id=1&pricing_id=3&coupon=CHRISTMASLET) | [Atlanta ( USA )](https://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/atlanta_hosting/?group_id=7&pricing_id=191&coupon=CHRISTMASLET) | [UK](http://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/uk_hosting/?group_id=3&pricing_id=11&coupon=CHRISTMASLET) | [OffShore ](http://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/offshore_hosting/?group_id=2&pricing_id=7&coupon=CHRISTMASLET)| [Asia](http://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/asia_hosting/?group_id=5&pricing_id=155&coupon=CHRISTMASLET) | [Netherlands](http://hostkoala.com/clients/order/config/index/netherlands_hosting/?group_id=6&pricing_id=203&coupon=CHRISTMASLET)

**Frequently Asked Questions**

**1. Where are the servers located**

Las Vegas - FibreHub, Las Vegas

Offshore - Roost ( Luxembourg )

Atlanta - Marietta Street Atlanta

Netherlands - Dataplace, Netherlands

Asia - OVH Datacenter in SIngapore

UK - MSPNick's basement

**2. How does your money back guarantee work ?**
If you are unsatisfied with our service, or do not need it within 45 days of purchase, make a support ticket, and we will process a FULL refund within 7 business days ( usually within the day )

**3. Coupon isn't working/ my account hasn't been provisioned/ I don't know if my service is activated yet.**
All services are activated within 5 minutes of payment. However, this is an automatic service, and sometimes, bug happens . Also, maybe your email got to spam. Worry not, just open a friendly support ticket, or mail us at support@hostkoala.com and we will look into it ASAP !

We also have a live [Uptime page](http://hostkoala.com/uptime.html) and Live [Server Status page](http://hostkoala.com/serverstatus.html), where you can see CPU loads, RAM/SSD space availability on each server

**Need more help?**
Any questions can be asked here, or via email to support@hostkoala.com
We'd like to thank you for your time reading this post, and happy hosting !
